references.paper_title: From attribution maps to human-understandable explanations through concept relevance propagation
references.reason: This paper is important because it introduces a method for creating human-understandable explanations from attribution maps, which is relevant to the interpretability of the authors' proposed Dehazing Attribution Map (DAM).

references.paper_title: O-haze: a dehazing benchmark with real hazy and haze-free outdoor images
references.reason: This paper is crucial as it presents the O-HAZE dataset, a real-world hazy image dataset used by the authors to validate their dehazing method, demonstrating its performance on real-world haze conditions.

references.paper_title: Single image haze removal using dark channel prior
references.reason: This paper is foundational as it introduces the Dark Channel Prior, a widely used and influential technique in single image dehazing, serving as a baseline or comparison point for many subsequent dehazing methods.
This paper is very important as it describes the Integrated Gradients (IG) method, which is used as a foundation for Dehazing Attribution Map (DAM) for interpretablity of DehazeXL.

references.paper_title: Ultra-high-definition image dehazing via multi-guided bilateral learning
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant as it addresses dehazing of ultra-high-definition images, similar to the authors' focus, and introduces the 4KID dataset, which the authors used for training and comparison.
